description: This dataset contains economic variables gathered from the American Community Survey (ACS) from 2018 to 2022. It includes data related to public assistance such as SNAP benefits.
source: American Community Survey 5-year data - U.S. Census Bureau

variables.name: hh_retirement_income_p
variables.description: Percentage of total households with retirement income
variables.units: Percent out of total households in geography

variables.name: hh_public_assistance_p
variables.description: Percent of all households with cash public assistance income
variables.units: Percent out of total households geography population

variables.name: hh_snap_p
variables.description: Percetage of all households with Food Stamp/SNAP benefits in the past 12 months
variables.units: Percent out of total households geography population

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
